inputSpec.name: Genome
inputSpec.label: Goby Indexed Genome
inputSpec.help: The genome that the reads were mapped against, indexed with Goby.

inputSpec.name: Goby_Alignment
inputSpec.label: Goby alignment
inputSpec.help: One or several alignments in the Goby format.

inputSpec.name: Image_Version
inputSpec.label: Docker Image Version
inputSpec.help: The version of variationanalysis-app image to use in the execution.

outputSpec.name: SBI
outputSpec.label: Sequence Base Information
outputSpec.help: Training, validation and test set in .sbi format. Used to train DL callers.
